googledrive_file_added: A user added a file to Google Drive in a project
googledrive_file_removed: A user removed a file from Google Drive in a project
googledrive_file_updated: A user updated a file in Google Drive in a project
googledrive_folder_created: A user created a folder in Google Drive in a project
googledrive_folder_selected: A user linked a Google Drive folder to a project
googledrive_node_authorized: A user authorized the Google Drive addon for a project
googledrive_node_deauthorized: A user deauthorized the Google Drive addon for a project
googledrive_node_deauthorized_no_user: Google Drive addon for a project deauthorized
